subject: [Ip-health] USA for Innovation press release on Thai ad campaign
body: 69 (return) [ We are ignorant of the actual office of this excellent minister, whom Julian afterwards created pr¾fect of Gaul. Sallust was speedly recalled by the jealousy of the emperor; and we may still read a sensible but pedantic discourse, (p. 240-252,) in which Julian deplores the loss of so valuable a friend, to whom he acknowledges himself indebted for his reputation. See La Bleterie, Preface a la Vie de lovien, p. 20.]
